productTitle: Ikigai : Japanese Art of staying Young.. While growing Old
Title: Ikigai : Japanese Art of staying Young.. While growing Old
Description: What is Ikigai? Ikigai is the art of living life in a way that a person is always inspired to remain focused on their goal. The meaning of Ikigai is to make your life meaningful. The people who use the principles of Ikigai always wake up in the morning with a sense of meaning. This is the reason why, despite having been destroyed in the second world war, Japan did not only develop, but also became a nation of longevity. How was all this possible? This was only possible by adopting the principles of Ikigai. This book will not only provide you with theoretical ideas, but also how to lead the Ikigai life with practical examples. It is then that you will know what this Japanese way of living actually is. How the people of that country achieve their goals. How they scale great heights in society and achieve a high social standing. What do they eat that they are able to live a long and fruitful life. This book will help you live a successful life,a meaningful long life and achieve new heights of success every day, and you will enjoy it.

productTitle: Praan's HIVE Advanced Indoor Air Purifier | Covers Upto 350 Sq Ft | Medical Grade HEPA H14 Filter | Removes 99.99% Allergens as small as PM0.015| Real-Time AQI | App-Controlled | 1 Year Warranty
Title: Praan's HIVE Advanced Indoor Air Purifier | Covers Upto 350 Sq Ft | Medical Grade HEPA H14 Filter | Removes 99.99% Allergens as small as PM0.015| Real-Time AQI | App-Controlled | 1 Year Warranty
Description: ICU-grade filtration. Certified by SITRA - HIVE uses HEPA H14 filters - the highest global standard for air purification. It traps 99.99% of airborne pollutants, including viruses, bacteria, allergens, and ultra-fine particles as small as 0.015 microns. This is the same clean air standard used in ICU cleanrooms - and HIVE is one of the only purifiers in India to be clinically certified to deliver it. Proven to reduce respiratory symptoms - In real-world use, HIVE has helped reduce asthma attacks, chronic cough, and medication use. Families across India - including homes with children and the elderly - have reported breathing easier and sleeping better after switching to HIVE. Cleans a room in minutes - HIVE is engineered to rapidly purify spaces up to 345 sq ft - faster than most premium purifiers on the market. Whether it’s your bedroom, clinic, classroom, or workspace, it gets to work instantly and keeps your air clean all day, automatically. Real-time tracking of your air, not just AQI - HIVE continuously monitors PM2.5, VOCs, carbon dioxide, temperature, humidity, and even ambient noise. You can view everything on the OLED display or in the app. It not only cleans your air, but also helps you understand it. No gimmicks. Just pure, focused performance - Unlike lifestyle purifiers that double as fans or humidifiers, HIVE is built with one goal: delivering hospital-grade air quality. No unnecessary features. No distractions. Just protection that performs. Aircraft-grade build quality. Silent and lasting - Most purifiers use plastic. HIVE is machined from aerospace-grade aluminum for durability and a premium finish. It runs silently, blends into your interiors, and lasts for years, not seasons. Designed and built in India. Supported locally - HIVE is built entirely in-house by Praan in Mumbai - from R&D to final assembly. That means faster service, smarter innovation, and complete transparency. It’s proudly Indian, and trusted by global tech leaders and health professionals alike.

productTitle: Dreo 11L Smart Humidifier Large Room 700 ft², 100H Cool Mist Air Humidifiers for Bedroom, Top-Fill Self-Cleaning Tank, 26dB, Auto Mode, Aroma Box, RGB Light, Remote & APP Control, Baby, Plant, Blue
Title: Dreo 11L Smart Humidifier Large Room 700 ft², 100H Cool Mist Air Humidifiers for Bedroom, Top-Fill Self-Cleaning Tank, 26dB, Auto Mode, Aroma Box, RGB Light, Remote & APP Control, Baby, Plant, Blue
Description: After reading through multiple reviews, I noticed a lot of misunderstandings about how this humidifier operates. I’m here to clear them up so you get an accurate picture of what to expect. This humidifier has a sleek and modern design, with two lightweight sections divided by a silver band, all secured to a pedestal base with a twist lock and screw. • The flat lid has a 360-degree rotatable mist nozzle that is angled at 30 degrees. You can change the direction, but not the angle. • The lid features a protruding finger tab for easy removal. • Underneath the lid is a large water collection area with a centrally located mister. • It has drainage slots on one side that direct water into the main reservoir (which holds up to 11 liters or 2.96 gallons). • The top section houses the motor and a 5-ft polarized electrical cord, and it easily lifts off for cleaning. • The bottom section contains a simple water draw tube with an attached round water filter that is easy to replace. • Other than some plastic guides for water flow, the bottom reservoir is mostly empty. • The unit includes a rear aroma tray with removable absorbent material if you want to add fragrance. • Base dimensions: 10 inches wide × 8 inches deep • Height: 31 inches from floor to lid • Circumference: 23 inches • Max power usage: 32 watts • Water weight (full): ~24 lbs • Unit weight (empty): ~6 lbs • Handles? No, but it’s easy to move when it’s not full. I won’t go into deep technical details—you can download the user manual under “Product Guides and Documents” on the Amazon page. However, I will note: • Auto Mode: Whisper quiet • Highest setting (Level 3): Not bad in terms of noise, but audible. • App Integration: The Dreo app syncs first via Bluetooth, then WiFi only for Google and Alexa support. • Voice Control: You can control most features and scheduling through the app or with voice commands. • Alexa: Can tell you the humidity setting but not the current humidity level (this is an Alexa limitation, not a Dreo issue). • Google Assistant: Can provide both the humidity setting and current room humidity when asked: o Example: “Hey Google, what is the humidifier humidity level?” o If you named your device “humidifier,” Google will give you the correct response. • Important Note: This issue happens with other smart devices too. Alexa simply does not support reporting humidity levels, while Google does. One reviewer mentioned white dust buildup, which happens with humidifiers using hard water or well water. Solution? Use: ✅ Distilled water ✅ Refrigerator-filtered water ✅ Demineralized water I personally use my refrigerator’s filtered water and have zero white dust issues. I placed my humidifier in the middle of my living room, set the humidity goal to 65%, and went to bed. • Starting humidity: 22% • Morning humidity: 52% o (It didn’t reach 65% because my house leaks too much air, which would cost thousands to fix.) I primarily bought this humidifier to: ✅ Improve humidity for my houseplants ✅ Stop itchy, dry skin It works perfectly for both. If I needed another humidifier, I would buy this exact model again. Dreo did an excellent job with the design, functionality, and smart features. Highly recommended. Hope this review helps someone! Edit: Three points: 1. The reservoir tank is one solid floor of plastic which cannot leak, however if you fill excessively beyond the outside marked max water line, as seen on the front, the overfill will leak from the top backside. 2. The Dreco app gives you full control over the unit except it doesn’t provide a remaining water level gauge. That’s because the remaining water level is only read visually from the front outside. 3. You can turn the unit ON or OFF by voice (Alexa/Google) or in combination with the app or by a schedule. The schedule could be made on Alexa or on Google home or in the Dreco app, it all works. 4. This unit doesn’t provide any more white dust, than any other humidifier. White dust is simply excessive minerals, (total dissolve solids TDS) in the water. Again I use refrigerator filtered water which has total dissolved solids around 109 ppm. I liked the humidifier so much that I bought another identical one. My plants are happy and I don’t scratch.
includedComponents: 11L Humidifier x1, Aroma Pad, Cleaning Brush, Screw x 1, User Manual

productTitle: NUWAVE OxyPure ZERO Smart Air Purifier, Large Area up to 2,002 Sq Ft, Dual 4-Stage Air Filtration, Adjustable 30°, 60°, 90° Vents, Washable & Reusable Filters for ZERO Waste & ZERO Filter Replacements
Title: NUWAVE OxyPure ZERO Smart Air Purifier, Large Area up to 2,002 Sq Ft, Dual 4-Stage Air Filtration, Adjustable 30°, 60°, 90° Vents, Washable & Reusable Filters for ZERO Waste & ZERO Filter Replacements
Description: INDOOR AIR POLLUTION - EPA estimates that indoor air can be as much as 5 TIMES more polluted than the air outdoors. If you suffer from fatigue, headaches, congestion, or sneezing, you may be exposed to poor air quality conditions at home. PURIFY XL AREA UP TO 2,002 SQ FT – When you breathe, you may unwittingly be inhaling billions of pollutants that cannot be seen with the naked eye. OxyPure Zero has been proven to effectively purify a 1000 sq. ft room twice per hour and a 2002 sq. ft room once per hour. INTERTEK LAB CERTIFIED – Zero captures up to 100% of airborne particle pollutants as small as 0.1 microns including smoke, dust, and pollen. It can also remove airborne irritants such as pet hair, harmful chemicals, and ozone. DUAL 4-STAGE FILTERATION – The stainless-steel prefilter captures large particles. The ozone emission removal filter eliminates toxic ozone. 2 patented Bio-Guard Filters & the Bio-Guard 360 Filter remove harmful airborne particle pollutants and odors. REVOLUTIONARY FILTERATION TECHNOLOGY – Just like the vacuum cleaners did away with paper filters, so does the OxyPure Zero. The ultra-effective Bio-Guard filters are washable and reusable meaning ZERO waste and ZERO filter replacements. CALIFORNIA AIR RESOURCE BOARD CERTIFIED – OxyPure Zero meets the stringent California ozone emissions limit. It eliminates toxic Ozone in the home to less than 1 part per billion (ppb), about 70 times less than the EPA’s designated safe level of 70 ppb. ENERGY STAR CERTIFIED – Even when operating 24/7, the annual electricity cost is minimal! Check with your local utility company to determine if a portion of the purchase qualifies for a rebate. It is also ETL certified.
